title: Who Murdered Her Family?: A Small Town, Friends-to-Lovers Romance Murder Mystery
description: This is a story about a wife, Sheila Smith, who was struggling from a bout with depression. Sheila had the perfect life with a devoted husband and two beautiful children, a son, Julian age 6, and a daughter, Sarah age 8. The family enjoyed their family outings together. They were the perfect family at least that is what everyone thought. Sheila ended up meeting a new friend at the gym which changed her. Soon after Sheila attended the gym her families lives were changed with what was to come.
author: J. R. Glenn
